ViewObject.Name: PositionLimitVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
select * from (SELECT INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.INVESTOR_CODE INVESTOR_CODE, PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_TYPE, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.NAME NAME, PRODUCT_BOID.BOID BOID, INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_NAME INSTRUMENT_NAME, INSTRUMENTS.SHORT_NAME SHORT_NAME, INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_TYPE INSTRUMENT_TYPE, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.VERSION_NO, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.APP_DATE, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.MORN_INTRADAY, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Limit_Id, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Change_Salable_Qty SALABLE_QTY, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Avg_Cost Avg_Cost, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Operation, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BUSINESS_TYPE BUSINESS_TYPE, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.Account_Status, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.Mbank_Id, INSTRUMENTS.ISIN ISIN, broker_mapping.broker_id as broker_id, broker_mapping.trading_code, case when Products.Product_Type='OWN' then 'OWN' else 'OTHER'end ProductCategory , brokers.short_name as broker_short_name, markets.market_code Board_Ref_Code -- FROM INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS, INSTRUMENTS, PRODUCT_BOID, PRODUCTS, broker_mapping, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT, Fti_Position_Limit_Details, brokers, instrument_exchanges, markets WHERE INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Account_Id AND FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.LIMIT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Limit_Id AND investor_accounts.account_id = broker_mapping.account_id(+) AND INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Instrument_Id AND INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.PRODUCTBO_ID = PRODUCT_BOID.ID
AND INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_ID = instrument_exchanges.instrument_id(+) AND instrument_exchanges.market_id = markets.market_id(+) AND INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BOID IS NULL AND PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_TYPE <> 'BDA' AND INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.PRODUCT_ID = PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_ID AND INSTRUMENTS.Instrument_Type <> 'PREFERENCE' AND INSTRUMENTS.Isin IS NOT NULL AND INSTRUMENTS.Status = 'ACTIVE' AND INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BUSINESS_TYPE = 'MBANK' AND broker_mapping.broker_id = brokers.broker_id AND INSTRUMENTS.Instrument_Type NOT IN ('TB') UNION SELECT INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.INVESTOR_CODE INVESTOR_CODE, PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_TYPE, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.NAME NAME, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BOID BOID, INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_NAME INSTRUMENT_NAME, INSTRUMENTS.SHORT_NAME SHORT_NAME, INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_TYPE INSTRUMENT_TYPE, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.VERSION_NO, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.APP_DATE, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.MORN_INTRADAY, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Limit_Id, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Change_Salable_Qty SALABLE_QTY, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Avg_Cost Avg_Cost, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Operation, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BUSINESS_TYPE BUSINESS_TYPE, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.Account_Status, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.Mbank_Id, INSTRUMENTS.ISIN ISIN, broker_mapping.broker_id as broker_id, broker_mapping.trading_code, case when Products.Product_Type='OWN' then 'OWN' else 'OTHER'end ProductCategory , brokers.short_name as broker_short_name, markets.market_code Board_Ref_Code-- FROM INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS, INSTRUMENTS, PRODUCTS, broker_mapping, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT, Fti_Position_Limit_Details, brokers, instrument_exchanges, markets WHERE INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Account_Id AND FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.LIMIT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Limit_Id AND investor_accounts.account_id = broker_mapping.account_id(+) AND INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Instrument_Id AND INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_ID = instrument_exchanges.instrument_id(+) AND instrument_exchanges.market_id = markets.market_id(+) AND INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BOID IS NOT NULL AND PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_TYPE <> 'BDA' AND INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.PRODUCT_ID = PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_ID AND INSTRUMENTS.Instrument_Type <> 'PREFERENCE' AND INSTRUMENTS.Isin IS NOT NULL AND INSTRUMENTS.Status = 'ACTIVE' AND INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BUSINESS_TYPE = 'MBANK' AND broker_mapping.broker_id = brokers.broker_id AND INSTRUMENTS.Instrument_Type NOT IN ('TB') UNION
SELECT INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.INVESTOR_CODE INVESTOR_CODE, PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_TYPE, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.NAME NAME, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BOID BOID, INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_NAME INSTRUMENT_NAME, INSTRUMENTS.SHORT_NAME SHORT_NAME, INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_TYPE INSTRUMENT_TYPE, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.VERSION_NO, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.APP_DATE, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.MORN_INTRADAY, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Limit_Id, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Change_Salable_Qty SALABLE_QTY, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Avg_Cost Avg_Cost, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Operation, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BUSINESS_TYPE BUSINESS_TYPE, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.Account_Status, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.Mbank_Id, INSTRUMENTS.ISIN ISIN, null as broker_id, null as trading_code, case when Products.Product_Type='OWN' then 'OWN' else 'OTHER'end ProductCategory , null as broker_short_name, markets.market_code Board_Ref_Code-- FROM INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS, INSTRUMENTS, PRODUCTS, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT, Fti_Position_Limit_Details, instrument_exchanges, markets WHERE INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Account_Id AND FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.LIMIT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Limit_Id AND INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Instrument_Id AND INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_ID = instrument_exchanges.instrument_id(+) AND instrument_exchanges.market_id = markets.market_id (+) AND PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_TYPE <> 'BDA' AND INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.PRODUCT_ID = PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_ID AND INSTRUMENTS.Instrument_Type <> 'PREFERENCE' AND INSTRUMENTS.Isin IS NOT NULL AND INSTRUMENTS.Status = 'ACTIVE' AND INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BUSINESS_TYPE = 'BROKER' AND INSTRUMENTS.Instrument_Type NOT IN ('TB')
union all select ins.trade_code as investor_code, ins.product_type, ins.product_name as name, ins.BOID as BOID, 'bda_instrument' as instrument_name, ins.SHORT_NAME as short_name, 'bda' as instrument_type, ins.VERSION_NO, ins.APP_DATE, ins.MORN_INTRADAY, ins.Limit_Id, sum(ins.SALABLE_QTY) as salable_qty, ins.Avg_Cost Avg_Cost, ins.operation, ins.business_type, ins.account_status, ins.mbank_id, ins.isin as ISIN, null as broker_id, null as trading_code, case when ins.Product_Type='OWN' then 'OWN' else 'OTHER'end ProductCategory , null as broker_short_name, ins.market_code Board_Ref_Code-- from (SELECT INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.INVESTOR_CODE INVESTOR_CODE, products.product_name, products.trade_code trade_code, PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_BOID.BOID BOID, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.NAME NAME, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BOID A_BOID, INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_NAME INSTRUMENT_NAME, INSTRUMENTS.SHORT_NAME SHORT_NAME, INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_TYPE INSTRUMENT_TYPE, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.VERSION_NO, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.APP_DATE, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.MORN_INTRADAY, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Limit_Id, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Change_Salable_Qty SALABLE_QTY, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Avg_Cost Avg_Cost, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Operation, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BUSINESS_TYPE BUSINESS_TYPE, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.Account_Status ACCOUNT_STATUS, INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.Mbank_Id, INSTRUMENTS.ISIN ISIN, null as broker_short_name, markets.market_code FROM INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS, INSTRUMENTS, PRODUCTS, PRODUCT_BOID, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT, Fti_Position_Limit_Details, instrument_exchanges, markets WHERE INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Account_Id AND FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.LIMIT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Limit_Id AND INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Instrument_Id AND PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'BDA' AND PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_ID = PRODUCT_BOID.PRODUCT_ID AND INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.PRODUCT_ID = PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_ID
AND INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_ID = instrument_exchanges.instrument_id(+) AND instrument_exchanges.market_id = markets.market_id(+) AND INSTRUMENTS.Instrument_Type <> 'PREFERENCE' AND INSTRUMENTS.Isin IS NOT NULL AND INSTRUMENTS.Status = 'ACTIVE' AND INVESTOR_ACCOUNTS.BUSINESS_TYPE = 'MBANK' AND INSTRUMENTS.Instrument_Type NOT IN ('TB')) ins group by ins.trade_code, ins.boid, ins.isin, ins.SHORT_NAME, ins.product_type, ins.product_name, ins.business_type, ins.account_status, ins.mbank_id, ins.VERSION_NO, ins.APP_DATE, ins.MORN_INTRADAY, ins.Limit_Id, ins.operation, ins.avg_cost, ins.market_code
union SELECT dealer_mapping.INVESTOR_CODE INVESTOR_CODE, 'OTHER' PRODUCT_TYPE, dealer_mapping.NAME NAME, dealer_mapping.BOID BOID, INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_NAME INSTRUMENT_NAME, INSTRUMENTS.SHORT_NAME SHORT_NAME, INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_TYPE INSTRUMENT_TYPE, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.VERSION_NO, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.APP_DATE, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.MORN_INTRADAY, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Limit_Id, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Change_Salable_Qty SALABLE_QTY, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Avg_Cost Avg_Cost, Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Operation, 'BROKER' BUSINESS_TYPE, dealer_mapping.status Account_Status, null Mbank_Id, INSTRUMENTS.ISIN ISIN, 1 as broker_id, null trading_code, 'OTHER' ProductCategory , null as broker_short_name, markets.market_code Board_Ref_Code-- FROM dealer_mapping, INSTRUMENTS, FTI_POSITION_LIMIT, Fti_Position_Limit_Details, instrument_exchanges, markets WHERE dealer_mapping.investor_code = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Investor_Code AND FTI_POSITION_LIMIT.LIMIT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Limit_Id AND INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_ID = Fti_Position_Limit_Details.Instrument_Id AND INSTRUMENTS.INSTRUMENT_ID = instrument_exchanges.instrument_id(+) AND instrument_exchanges.market_id = markets.market_id(+) AND INSTRUMENTS.Instrument_Type <> 'PREFERENCE' AND INSTRUMENTS.Isin IS NOT NULL AND INSTRUMENTS.Status = 'ACTIVE' AND INSTRUMENTS.Instrument_Type NOT IN ('TB')) t WHERE t.App_Date = :sys_date ORDER BY t.INVESTOR_CODE, t. product_type
